channel.title: Copy Pasting ability feedback text ruining games
channel.description:
Just experienced a game where I was evil and fakeclaimed, then I was asked to copy paste the message that will show up in the message box when you do your night actions. Having never seen this shit before I had no message prepared and was lynched. Now of course I could have been lynched anyway. But the fact that I did not copy paste a the ability feedback should not impact that decision. I do not want to have a word doc with all the different system messages ready for copy pasting to prove my role. The only thing that should tell the others what my role is or is not should be my play.
TLDR: Please remove the ability to copy paste from the message box, so this don't become a thing.
